title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Renata>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveToX Renata Mia 35 60>>
<<moveToY Renata Mia 0 60>>
<<moveRight Mia 1 20>>
<<moveLeft Renata 1 20>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 14>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
Girl 1-miafiercefight:Here we go!
Girl 2-renatafightface: You can't guard me!
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<moveLeft Renata 3 60>>
<<moveRight Mia 3 60>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 16>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 17>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 17>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 18>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 18>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.7>>
[[jumpback]]

title: jumpback
body:

title: renatahits
body:

[[save]]

title: save
body:
Girl 1-miafallingface: Ahhhhhh!
Girl 2-renatascaredface: I've got you Mia!
<<moveLeft Renata 28 120>>
<<moveRight Mia 5 20>>
<<moveRight Renata 10 20>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 4>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 10>>
Mia: *huff*...Renata, you got me...
Renata-renatasmilingface: Of course I did! It wouldn't be as fun to win if you got a broken arm!
<<moveRight Mia 3 30>>
<<moveLeft Renata 3 30>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1>>
<<moveRight Renata 8 30>>
Mia: Ok, that's enough fencing for now.
Renata: Yeah, I'm hungry!
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>

<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Renata>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveLeft Mia 10 30>>
<<moveUp Renata 10 50>>
<<moveRight Renata 50 50>>
<<moveRight Mia 1 20>>
<<moveLeft Renata 1 20>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 14>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 14>>
Girl 1-miafiercefight:Here we go!
Girl 2-renatafightface: You can't guard me!
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 15>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 15>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 16>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 16>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 17>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Renata renata 18>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 15>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 16>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 17>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.05>>
<<animationFrame Mia mia 18>>
<<moveLeft Renata 15 125>>
<<moveLeft Mia 15 125>>
<<moveRight Renata 10 90>>
Girl 2-renatafightface: Take that!
<<moveRight Mia 10 90>>
<<moveRight Mia 25 120>>
<<moveRight Renata 10 60>>
<<moveLeft Mia 10 90>>
Girl 1-miahappyfight: Ha ha!
<<moveLeft Renata 10 60>>
<<moveLeft Renata 10 90>>
<<moveLeft Mia 35 50>>
Girl 1-miafallingface: Ahhhhhh!
Girl 2-renatascaredface: I've got you Mia!
<<moveLeft Renata 40 120>>
<<moveRight Mia 5 20>>
<<moveRight Renata 10 20>>
Mia: *huff*...Renata, you got me...
Renata-renatasmilingface: Of course I did! It wouldn't be as fun to win if you got a broken arm!
<<moveRight Mia 3 30>>
<<moveLeft Renata 3 30>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1>>
<<moveRight Renata 8 30>>
Mia: Ok, that's enough fencing for now.
Renata: Yeah, I'm hungry!
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
